description: Academic publisher in the Humanities and Social Sciences. Member of Taylor & Francis Group
The flagship journal of the Linguistic Society of America
A learned society for the field of linguistics
An open access journal of the LSA
A forum intended for the distribution of papers to natural language semanticists and philosophers of language
International scientific and professional society for people working on problems involving natural language and computation
A research journal dedicated to the publication of high quality articles in formal phonology, morphology, syntax and semantics
